org.netbeans.spi.search.provider

Class SearchProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.spi.search.provider.SearchProvider

  • public abstract class SearchProvider
extends Object
    Search provider can register complex search feature to the IDE.

    Example:

     // use annotation to register this provider
  @ServiceProvider(service = SearchProvider.class)
 public class ExampleSearchProvider extends SearchProvider {

   // Create presenter
   public Presenter createPresenter(boolean replaceMode) {
       return new BasicSearchPresenter(replaceMode);
   }

   // Replacing is supported.
   public boolean isReplaceSupported() {
       return true;
   }
   
   // This search provider is always enabled.
   public boolean isEnabled() {
       return true; // could be disabled on some platforms
   }
 }

    • Method Detail

      • createPresenter

        @NonNull
public abstract SearchProvider.Presenter createPresenter(boolean replaceMode)
        Create presenter for this search provider.
        Parameters:
        replaceMode - True if the presenter will be used in Replace dialog, false if it will be used in Find dialog.
        Returns:
        New presenter that will be used in the search dialog.

      • getTitle

        @NonNull
public abstract String getTitle()
        Get title to show in a tab of the search dialog.
        Returns:
        Localized title for this search provider.

      • isReplaceSupported

        public abstract boolean isReplaceSupported()
        If replace is supported, this dialog will be shown in replace dialog.
        Returns:
        True if replace is supported by this type of search, false otherwise.

      • isEnabled

        public abstract boolean isEnabled()
        Tells whether this search provider is enabled. It can depend on operating system, type of opened projects, or available databases.
        Returns:
        True if this provider is enabled at the moment, false otherwise.
